DOC.detailed_description: 35 male patient , age 45 year old , document benign prostatic hypertrophy ( BPH ) varicocele visualize ultrasound and/or termography examination enrol . Each patient undergo full urologic examination exclude possible malignancy well thorough medical examination establish eligibility treatment . In selected patient varicocele obliterate mean embolization spermatic vein . The patient follow every three month abdominal ultrasound well serial PSA period 6-12 month .
